participant_1.background:
I have always been fascinated by the ancient ruins of Greece, so my most exotic travel experience was a trip to the island of Santorini.
i live in the city of grand rapids , michigan.
i live with my wife and kids.
I wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.
i have a big beard.

participant_2.background:
I drive a van because it's spacious and I can take my friends along to watch Scooby Doo at the drive-in theater.
i am a doctor.
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
i have a vacation home in the mountains.
I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
Hello, it's going well thanks, how about yours?
It is going well, I just got back from a trip to Greece and I am excited to share some pictures of it with you.
Oh that sounds awesome! I have always wanted to visit Greece, what was it like?
It was amazing! I visited the island of Santorini and it was so beautiful. The ancient ruins were really cool to see and the food was amazing.
That sounds like an incredible experience! I am so jealous. I am sure your pictures will be amazing.
Thanks, I am hoping to post them online soon. I am also a big fan of Scooby Doo, have you ever been to the drive in theater?
Yes, I have! I love going to the drive in theater, it's so much fun. I used to go with my friends all the time when I was younger.
That sounds awesome! I used to go with my friends all the time too. We would always watch Scooby Doo and eat popcorn.
That sounds like so much fun! I miss those days.
